title: Talon wrecks Ekko
body:
I've played Ekko on PBE tons of games and when I couldn't get him, I picked Talon. 

Talon can burst Ekko down before he can ult away, and if he does manage to get away your ult is on a way shorter CD than Ekkos. 

Just take care if he has hourglass up, Watch out for the W+Hourglass combo and you'll be fine.

replies.body: iv played yi vs ekko in mid and i won handly i pushed both mid turrets by 15 and was reking him even with all of his kit .... You can say what u want Yi isnt just Q but i still whiped ekko handly

Beat the pants off ekko with AP Nasus. Ekko is cake to beat with almost any champ so long as you do 3 simple things. 

1. Dodge his w. Its very easy to do, and even easier if you have a higher mobility champ. Its what everyone is having a hard time with and one of the reasons ekko is "OP" at the moment. As soon as people learn his tell, his winrate is going to drop.

2. Don't chase him. His ult relies on YOU being stupid for it to do damage. If you don't chase him, it will be incredibly hard for him to land the damage portion, though the health regen is still a factor. 

3. Don't stay in melee range for longer than 4 seconds. For the same reason as above, keeping all your skirmishes under 4 seconds will mitigate half his damage. His poke isn't very good and most of his other moves require you to sit there and trade with him for a few. Don't give him the opportunity. Play the assassin and end it early, or play a poke champ and keep your distance. Either way, he's not bad to lane against.
